32bit: This will install the 32-bit variant of all selected patterns. This allows to execute 32-bit software.
base: This is the base runtime system.  It contains only a basic multiuser booting system. For running on real hardware, you need to add additional packages and pattern to make this pattern useful on its own.
devel_C_C++:
Tools and libraries for software development using C/C++ and other derivative
of the C programming language.
devel_basis: Minimal set of tools for compiling and linking applications.
devel_rpm_build: Minimal set of tools and libraries for building packages using the RPM package manager.
wsl_base: This package contains the wsl_base pattern: recommended configs,tools,libraries for using WSL.
